name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: These shirts were not heavy duty cotton. They feel more like a cotton blend with polyester and a regular weight cotton. I as disappointed in the feel and fit of these but am keeping them because they are still wearable.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 12 December 2020

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: Nothing to dislike. So far just what I wanted and what was expected.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: Product is as described. Regular fit great love them.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: The color was as expected, and the weight of the shirt was a good quality, but the shirt is 100% cotton. It does not run true to size, then when it is washed, it runs about 1 1/2 sizes smaller. a XL is a between an Large and a medium. Good quality shirt, you just need to adjust to the size for what you need it for.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 5 October 2021

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
date.of.review: Reviewed in Canada on 10 July 2022

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: My wife often  gets t-shirts printed up for her student groups, and always chooses Gildan shirts when she can, because they last forever. So I tried these, and the fit just isn't right. I'm 6'1" tall, long in the body, and  not a body builder. As a result, these shirts are too short in the body, and the arm holes are way too big. They're going straight to Goodwill.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 11 May 2020

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: This is a quality made tee shirt that holds its shape and looks good after washing. Very comfortable, roomy fit and comes in a variety of colors. Very reasonably priced with two to the package. I liked them so much, I cleaned out my tee shirt drawer and ordered several other colors.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 January 2020

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: Price for them is unbeatable.  Seem well made.  Very comfortable.  And longer than average t-shirts, which is a change from the short t-shirts I usually end up with
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 2 July 2020

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: These were part of a gift.

reviews: Very comfortable shirts. Comfort and thickness matter to me.

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: So comfortable perfect for hanging with friends. Try them and you will buy more

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: I'm totally in love with Gildan tees. By now I have quite a few different colors and they all fit well and wash well. No shrinking no fading.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 16 February 2020

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: These are very nice tshirts I wear them under my work shirt daily.  I have noticed the shirts do become loose but I never expected them neckline stiching to come loose I cannot wear this shirt to work because it would be seen.  I will have to find other tshirts to wear.  Just be aware of this before you buy them.  The other shirt does not have the stiching coming loose but I will monitor it.  I really liked the color and fit but will keep looking this tshirt will become the yard work shirt.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 1 May 2022

name: Gildan Men's Heavy Cotton Short Sleeve T-Shirt, 2-Pack
reviews: These are absolutely the most awful T-shirts I have ever owned. They bulge, wrinkle terribly even while wearing it, and you simply cannot keep the wrinkles gone. Even with an iron. I also didn't receive the shirts until weeks after tracking said they had been delivered. The seller was of ZERO help and quite rude and insulting. Pass this seller up. You will be thankful you did.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 August 2021
